nodes.text: Simplicity is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on March 10, 2005 and took the form of two assassins, Haque and Zlash, discussing the situation in the Cularin system now that Nirama has been killed, the Jedi killer destroyed, and the Navy of Thaere defeated.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, it meant the end of a number of bonuses, benefits and penalties that had applied to player-characters.
